text: Do we have functionality to export all functions from a module yet? Something like `export *` ? Alternatively, is there a way I can get the function symbol names from a module, so i can write a little for loop that will formulate a string "export func1, func2, func3" so I don't have to do it manually?

Ahh, needed this
```julia> names(Main.mymodule, all=true)```
I can probably use this to create a one-time string
